Gifty Klenam bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Ghana ma bụrụkwa onye omeiwu nke Lower West Akim na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ Ghana na nzuko omeiwu nke ise nke mba 4th nke Ghana.
A mụrụ Klenam na July 12, 1970. Ọ si Asamankese na mpaghara ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Ghana. Ọ nwetara asambodo na nchịkwa nchịkwa na Ghana Institute of Management and Public Administration na 2008.

N'ịbụ onye a họpụtara ma bụrụ onye otu ndị omeiwu, Gifty Klenam bụ onye na-emepụta ihe na onye ọrụ ugbo, Ọ bụkwa onye isi ụlọ ọrụ Sunharvest Company Limited nke dị na Pokuase. Ugbu a, ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onyeisi oche na Ghana Export Promotion Authority.

Klenam bụ onye otu New Patriotic Party. A họpụtara ya na mbụ dị ka onye omeiwu iji nọchite anya Lower West Akim Constituency na 2008 Ghanaian General Elections ma ọ malitere ọrụ na 7 Jenụwarị 2009. A họpụtara ya ọzọ na ntuli aka izugbe nke 2012 mana o meriri primaries ya na Eyiah Kyei-Baffour na 2015 ma enweghị ike ịzọ ọkwa na ntuli aka mba Ghana nke afọ 2016..
A họpụtara Klenam na ntuli aka Ghana nke afọ 2008 dị ka onye omeiwu maka mpaghara Lower West Akim na omeiwu nke ise nke mba Ghana nke anọ

A họpụtara ya na tiketi nke New Patriotic party mgbe ọ nwetasịrị votu 21,912 n'ime vootu 36,337 ziri ezi, nke kwekọrọ na 60.3% nke ngụkọta vootu. A họpụtara ya ka Juda Mohammed Awale nke People's National Convention, Seth Otchere nke National Democratic Congress, Nyadua Kofi Evans nke Democratic People's Party, Patrick Kwabena Adjei nke Convention People's Party na Martin Bruce Opare onye nọọrọ onwe ya. Ndị a nwetara 1.69%, 35.45%, 0.32% na 2.23% n'otu n'otu nke ngụkọta vootu niile ziri ezi.
Klenam lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ. Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst na-efe ofufe na International Central Gospel Church. Ọ na-efe ofufe na Salvation Gate Chapel.
